== About Me ==
Hi, my name is Bartlomiej Zolnierkiewicz (https://launchpad.net/~bzolnier). I am a member of the <nowiki>[[KernelTeam|{{https:--launchpadlibrarian.net-7080714-ubuntu-kernel-team-small.png}}]]</nowiki><nowiki>[[KernelTeam|Ubuntu Kernel Team]]</nowiki> at Canonical.

== What I do ==
I joined the Linux Kernel Team at Canonical in November 2021. During the first 9 months I have been contributing to the Ubuntu Cloud Linux Kernels. Then I've become responsible for Ubuntu Bluefield Linux Kernels.
